GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
RISC-V: Fixup get incorrect user mode PC for kernel mode regs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 111a049cacc6a15e7adc17256d196cb91b517853, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit e53d28180d4d0fd12b6d2bde49cb87aa775b6ba8. For more details please see the references link.
